Interface ScriptingTool

  • All Superinterfaces:

extends org.apache.velocity.tools.view.tools.ViewTool

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String eval(java.lang.String scriptletOrFile)
      Will evaluate a file OR passed in scriptlet executing the last expression if there is one in the file
      java.lang.String evalExpression(java.lang.String file, java.lang.String evalExpression)
      Similar to the eval except this can return an actual scripting object to be passed to the call method.
      void set(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object val)
      Sets global variables
